entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 13 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
